A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: the movie worth 1.5hours\, not 2.5hours. Finn and Rose is not needed in the movie\, at all. The story is boring \, not a typical star wars movie. The last 20 mins is totally ok if it is not there. If we name it to Star Ship Troopers: The Last Trooper then i am not so disappointed with this Grade B movie.
